job_history.work_description: Evaluate current fraud situations and formulate recommendations to reduce in the future. Use anti-money laundering (AML) software to review members' activity for money laundering and other suspicious activity. Review structuring reports if software is not functional. Work cases and alerts generated by software, documenting conclusions reached and actions taken.

Provided superior member service in the Retail branch, answering/ resolving member questions, and discrepancies; performed and processed transactions on sales side of branch- i.e. membership/ loan applications; resolving account related issues; and all cash-related responsibilities related to the service side

Oversaw and supported the day-to-day department production activities which included cross training, control, and audit activities, production, and quality control to achieve targeted business goals / objectives.

Provided oversight, monitoring, and decision making of the workflow for a team of Operational researchers in a fast paced environment requiring application of various complex methods, procedures and knowledge of business unit's product(s) and application(s); repaired any negative impact to both internal and / or external customers.

Managed opening and closing times for the main branch. Oversaw training for all new branch employees. Managed team of 10 branch tellers. Balanced daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in evaluating current fraud situations, using anti-money laundering (AML) software, and reviewing suspicious activity, indicating strong proficiency in risk management.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Has experience working with anti-money laundering (AML) software and reviewing structuring reports, suggesting strong proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has managed teams in various roles, including a team of 10 branch tellers, and provided oversight and decision making for operational researchers, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Has experience overseeing day-to-day department production activities, cross training, control, and audit activities, and managing workflow for a team of operational researchers, suggesting strong proficiency in operations management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has provided superior member service in a retail branch, answering and resolving member questions and discrepancies, indicating a solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Has experience balancing daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate, indicating a solid working proficiency in cash management.

skills.name: Audit and Control
skills.explanation: Has experience with control and audit activities, and has managed workflow for a team of operational researchers, indicating a solid working proficiency in audit and control.
